CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Smoothly switch between normal perspective and Equirectangular coordinates. Best results with this slider at 0% or 100%.
CONTROLS.NAME: perspective

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Just move the X-axis to spin about your main axis, or move the Y-axis to tilt forwards or backwards.
CONTROLS.NAME: lookXY

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Modify the Menger fractal to give it a more complex look. Find an interesting spot and save it.
CONTROLS.NAME: noise

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Change from thick chunks of structure to thin bars and panels.
CONTROLS.NAME: thin_structure

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Goes further than 'thin structure' to fully open it up.
CONTROLS.NAME: fully_open

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Rate that you fly into or out of the structure. 50% is no motion, 100% is motion forward, 0% is motion backwards. But it automatically reverses if you change perspective.
CONTROLS.NAME: rate

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Change the size of the media in comparison with the struture.
CONTROLS.NAME: media_scale

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Choose whether you want to add the real colors from the media or multiply the media colors in with the scene's natural colors.
CONTROLS.NAME: media_mult_or_add
